amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 51 in the Congressional Record of July 22, 1997 to prohibit funds appropriated in the bill from being made available to the government of Croatia to relocate the remains of Croatian Ustashe soldiers at the site of the WWII concentration camp at Jasenovac, Croatia.

action.text: Yates amendment (A009) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Yates amendment (A009) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
